title: Anomalies
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: Anomalies

ActivityInsights.description: Insights about the activites corresponding to the generated anomaly as JSON.

AnomalyDetails.description: JSON object containing general information about the rule and algorithm that generated the anomaly as well as explanations for the anomaly.

AnomalyReasons.description: The detailed explanation of the generated anomaly as JSON.

AnomalyTemplateId.description: The ID of the Anomaly template that generated this anomaly.

AnomalyTemplateName.description: The name of the Anomaly template that generated this anomaly.

AnomalyTemplateVersion.description: The version of the Anomaly template that generated this anomaly.

DestinationDevice.description: The destination device for which the anomaly was generated.

DestinationIpAddress.description: The destination ip address for which the anomaly was generated.

DestinationLocation.description: Info about the destination location for which the anomaly was generated as JSON.

DeviceInsights.description: Insights about the devices corresponding to the generated anomaly as JSON.

EndTime.description: The time (UTC) when the anomaly ended.

Entities.description: JSON object containing all entities involved in the generated anomaly.

ExtendedLinks.description: List of links pointing to the data that generated the anomaly.

ExtendedProperties.description: JSON object with additional data on the anomaly as key-value pairs.

Id.description: The ID of the generated anomaly.

RuleConfigVersion.description: The configuration version of the Anomaly analytics rule that generated this anomaly.

RuleId.description: The ID of the Anomaly analytics rule that generated this anomaly.

RuleName.description: The name of the Anomaly analytics rule that generated this anomaly.

RuleStatus.description: The status (Flighting/Production) of the Anomaly analytics rule that generated this anomaly.

SourceDevice.description: The source device for which the anomaly was generated.

SourceIpAddress.description: The source ip address for which the anomaly was generated.

SourceLocation.description: Info about the source location for which the anomaly was generated as JSON.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

StartTime.description: The time (UTC) when the anomaly started.

Tactics.description: List of MITRE ATT&CK tactics (strings) corresponding to the anomaly.

Techniques.description: List MITRE ATT&CK techniques (strings) corresponding to the anomaly.

TimeGenerated.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the anomaly was generated.

UserInsights.description: Insights about the users corresponding to the generated anomaly as JSON.

UserName.description: The username for which the anomaly was generated.

UserPrincipalName.description: The UPN of the user for which the anomaly was generated.

VendorName.description: The name of the vendor that generated this anomaly.

WorkspaceId.description: The ID of the Sentinel workspace.
